price: ¿No has visto cómo tu Señor castigó al pueblo de ‘Ád
arabic: أَلَمۡ تَرَ كَيۡفَ فَعَلَ رَبُّكَ بِعَادٍ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: alam tara kayfa faʿala rabbuka biʿādin
